hero.title: Hero Subtitle
hero.content: Tailored journeys, Nile cruises, and cultural adventures by local experts

our_story.title: Founder Quote
our_story.content: "Preserving the ancient art of Nile navigation for future generations"

our_story.title: Our Story Content
our_story.content: Our journey began over 30 years ago when Captain Ahmed Hassan, a third-generation Nile navigator, had a vision to revive the authentic way of exploring Egypt's ancient wonders. Growing up along the banks of the Nile, he witnessed the transformation of river travel and felt called to preserve the traditional Dahabiya experience.

our_story.title: Our Story Paragraph 2
our_story.content: What started as a single restored Dahabiya has grown into a fleet of carefully maintained vessels, each one a testament to traditional Egyptian craftsmanship combined with modern comfort and safety standards.

our_story.title: Our Story Paragraph 3
our_story.content: Today, we continue Captain Hassan's legacy by offering intimate, authentic Nile experiences that connect our guests with the timeless beauty and rich history of Egypt, one journey at a time.

our_story.title: Our Story Paragraph 4
our_story.content: Every member of our crew shares this passion for preserving Egyptian heritage while creating unforgettable memories for travelers from around the world.

packages.title: Packages Section Subtitle
packages.content: Choose from our carefully crafted packages, each designed to showcase the best of Egypt's ancient wonders and natural beauty

safety.title: Safety Subtitle
safety.content: All our Dahabiyas are certified and regularly inspected to ensure the highest safety standards

share_memories.title: Share Memories Content
share_memories.content: Your journey with us doesn't end when you disembark. We believe that the memories created during your Dahabiya experience are meant to be shared and cherished forever. Join our community of travelers who have fallen in love with the magic of the Nile.

what_is.title: What is Dahabiya Content
what_is.content: A Dahabiya is a traditional Egyptian sailing boat that has been navigating the Nile River for centuries. These elegant vessels, with their distinctive lateen sails and shallow draft, were once the preferred mode of transport for Egyptian nobility and wealthy travelers exploring the ancient wonders along the Nile.

why_different.title: Why Different Content
why_different.content: While traditional Nile cruise ships can accommodate 200-400 passengers, Dahabiyas offer an intimate experience with only 8-12 guests. This fundamental difference creates a completely different travel experience that feels more like a private yacht charter than a commercial cruise.

why_different.title: Why Different Title
why_different.content: Why is Dahabiya different from regular Nile Cruises?
